ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-A multi-instrument Level 1 IMPACT data from CDAWeb
ResourceHeader.Description: Level 1 data from each of several IMPACT instruments (SWEA, MAG, LET, SEPT, SIT), in CDF. Time resolutions range from 0.125s (MAG) to 1m (SEPT, LET). Full spectral and directional resolution is preserved in the data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Principal Investigator Janet Luhmann, and key person(s) for the instrument(s) whose data you are using. (cf. web site)

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb ftp site
AccessURL.Description: for downloading CDF files via ftp

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Principal Investigator Janet Luhmann, the key person(s) for the instrument(s) whose data you are using (cf. web site), and the CDAWeb team at GSFC/SPDF.

TimeSpan.Note: Exact stop and end dates differ for various instruments' data. Lag time of latest data is typically some months.
